data.title: Hostos Academic Learning Center (HALC)
data.text: The Hostos Academic Learning Center (HALC) provides a variety of free support services to deepen students’ academic experiences and complement instructional learning. Through its tutoring program, the center seeks to offer a supportive learning environment that serves to enrich students’ opportunities for exploration, growth and success in their classes. Tutorial services are available at the HALC in a variety of college level courses, including Math, Accounting, Biology, Chemistry, History, Spanish, X-ray, Psychology, and Sociology. Tutoring support is available to all Hostos students in both in-person and online. Students can request an appointment to meet with a tutor either one-on-one or in small groups to provide general course review and exam preparation. The Hostos Academic Learning Center, located in room C-596, is open Monday through Thursday, 10am to 8pm and on Fridays, 10am to 5pm. For more information call the HALC at (718) 518-6624, or visit http://www.hostos.cuny.edu/halc/.
